channel.title: Morning Briefing
channel.description: Daily AU commercial property briefing — asset, fund, and acquisitions focused.

item.title: ASX Hits Record Highs Amid Westpac Gains
item.description: The ASX continues its record-breaking streak, largely thanks to Westpac's profit surge. However, with the Trump administration nudging the Fed towards rate cuts, the market's future remains uncertain. Stay informed on how these dynamics could affect your investments.
item.content:encoded: The ASX continues its record-breaking streak, largely thanks to Westpac's profit surge. However, with the Trump administration nudging the Fed towards rate cuts, the market's future remains uncertain. Stay informed on how these dynamics could affect your investments.

item.title: Gupta's Tahmoor Mine on the Brink as Creditors Move In
item.description:
Gupta's Tahmoor Mine Faces Liquidation

Sanjeev Gupta's last Australian coal asset is on the line as creditors, led by a union-backed insurer, pursue legal action over unpaid debts. This could mark the end of Gupta's mining ventures in Australia, with significant implications for the energy sector.
item.content:encoded:
Gupta's Tahmoor Mine Faces Liquidation

Sanjeev Gupta's last Australian coal asset is on the line as creditors, led by a union-backed insurer, pursue legal action over unpaid debts. This could mark the end of Gupta's mining ventures in Australia, with significant implications for the energy sector.

item.title: Pinch Payments Joins Australian FinTech
item.description:
Pinch Payments Joins Australian FinTech

Australia's top-rated payment solution for service businesses joins the fintech community. Founded in 2017, Pinch Payments is now part of the Australian FinTech landscape, aiming to expand its influence and service reach.
item.content:encoded:
Pinch Payments Joins Australian FinTech

Australia's top-rated payment solution for service businesses joins the fintech community. Founded in 2017, Pinch Payments is now part of the Australian FinTech landscape, aiming to expand its influence and service reach.

item.title: Trust at Checkout: Crucial for Aussie Consumers
item.description: Checkout.com's research shows Australian consumers are among the most trusting digital shoppers globally. This trust is crucial for online sales success and could influence retail property dynamics.
item.content:encoded: Checkout.com's research shows Australian consumers are among the most trusting digital shoppers globally. This trust is crucial for online sales success and could influence retail property dynamics.

item.title: RBA Rate Cut: A Breath of Fresh Air for SMEs
item.description: The RBA's decision to cut the official cash rate has been met with approval from Banjo Loans, who see it as a vital relief for Australia's SMEs. This move is expected to provide financial breathing space and foster optimism within the SME sector, potentially impacting commercial real estate dynamics.
item.content:encoded: The RBA's decision to cut the official cash rate has been met with approval from Banjo Loans, who see it as a vital relief for Australia's SMEs. This move is expected to provide financial breathing space and foster optimism within the SME sector, potentially impacting commercial real estate dynamics.

item.title: Australia’s Cheapest Home Bought Without Inspection
item.description: A Sydney buyer has taken a bold step by purchasing an abandoned, century-old country home sight unseen. Reportedly the cheapest home in Australia, the property includes beehives. Details remain scarce, but this move could signal growing interest in undervalued rural properties.
item.content:encoded: A Sydney buyer has taken a bold step by purchasing an abandoned, century-old country home sight unseen. Reportedly the cheapest home in Australia, the property includes beehives. Details remain scarce, but this move could signal growing interest in undervalued rural properties.

item.title: Insufficient Data
item.description: Insufficient data to create a newsletter block relevant to commercial real estate.
item.content:encoded: Insufficient data to create a newsletter block relevant to commercial real estate.

item.title: Clarity Pharmaceuticals: A Rock Star in Cancer Treatment
item.description: Clarity Pharmaceuticals: Making waves in the US with Australian innovation in cancer treatment. More AC/DC than the Wiggles, they're a clear contender in the prostate cancer space.
item.content:encoded: Clarity Pharmaceuticals: Making waves in the US with Australian innovation in cancer treatment. More AC/DC than the Wiggles, they're a clear contender in the prostate cancer space.

item.title: Strategic Partnership to Propel Australian SMEs Globally
item.description:
Strategic Partnership to Propel Australian SMEs Globally

The Export Council of Australia and WorldFirst have announced a strategic partnership aimed at empowering Australian SMEs to better navigate international markets. This collaboration seeks to bolster cross-border growth by providing SMEs with the necessary tools and support. The initiative is expected to enhance the global competitiveness of Australian businesses.
item.content:encoded:
Strategic Partnership to Propel Australian SMEs Globally

The Export Council of Australia and WorldFirst have announced a strategic partnership aimed at empowering Australian SMEs to better navigate international markets. This collaboration seeks to bolster cross-border growth by providing SMEs with the necessary tools and support. The initiative is expected to enhance the global competitiveness of Australian businesses.

item.title: Queensland Mayor Lists Dream Townsville Home
item.description: A Queensland mayor is selling her 'f***ing awesome' Townsville home. Originally intended as a retirement spot, the property is now on the market due to her rising popularity. Located near footy, fishing, and pubs, it's a prime piece of real estate.
item.content:encoded: A Queensland mayor is selling her 'f***ing awesome' Townsville home. Originally intended as a retirement spot, the property is now on the market due to her rising popularity. Located near footy, fishing, and pubs, it's a prime piece of real estate.

item.title: Maddingley Agent's Bold Pitch Sends Property Viral
item.description: An agent's bold three-word pitch has sent a Victorian property viral, drawing significant buyer interest. This highlights the potential of unconventional marketing in real estate.
item.content:encoded: An agent's bold three-word pitch has sent a Victorian property viral, drawing significant buyer interest. This highlights the potential of unconventional marketing in real estate.

item.title: Historic Queenslander Home Listed Amidst Market Surge
item.description: Discover the charm of a century-old Queenslander that inspired a hit TV show, now listed for sale in a booming market. A unique opportunity for investors seeking culturally significant assets.
item.content:encoded: Discover the charm of a century-old Queenslander that inspired a hit TV show, now listed for sale in a booming market. A unique opportunity for investors seeking culturally significant assets.

item.title: Limited-Time Land Discounts Across Victoria
item.description: Don't miss out on up to $48K discounts on land lots across Victoria. This limited-time offer is available for just three days. Act now to secure your investment.
item.content:encoded: Don't miss out on up to $48K discounts on land lots across Victoria. This limited-time offer is available for just three days. Act now to secure your investment.

item.title: Carrington Labs Teams Up with DigiFi for Enhanced Loan Underwriting
item.description: New Partnership Alert: Carrington Labs has joined forces with US fintech DigiFi to integrate cash flow underwriting into loan originations. This move could reshape credit risk assessments in the commercial real estate sector. Read more.
item.content:encoded: New Partnership Alert: Carrington Labs has joined forces with US fintech DigiFi to integrate cash flow underwriting into loan originations. This move could reshape credit risk assessments in the commercial real estate sector. Read more.

item.title: Reckon Reports Robust First Half with 16% Revenue Surge
item.description: Reckon Limited has reported a 16% increase in revenue, reaching $33 million for the first half of the year. The ASX-listed company's growth in EBITDA and NPAT highlights its strong financial health and effective business strategies.
item.content:encoded: Reckon Limited has reported a 16% increase in revenue, reaching $33 million for the first half of the year. The ASX-listed company's growth in EBITDA and NPAT highlights its strong financial health and effective business strategies.

item.title: Iress Posts Strong 1H25 Results, Eyes Growth
item.description: Iress Limited has reported strong financial results for the first half of 2025, indicating potential for accelerated growth. While specific financial metrics were not disclosed, the company's performance suggests it could be a key player in the tech sector. Read more
item.content:encoded: Iress Limited has reported strong financial results for the first half of 2025, indicating potential for accelerated growth. While specific financial metrics were not disclosed, the company's performance suggests it could be a key player in the tech sector. Read more

item.title: Visa Taps Meble Tin for Oceania Marketing Helm
item.description:
Visa Taps Meble Tin for Oceania Marketing Helm

Meble Tin steps in as Visa's Head of Marketing for Australia, New Zealand, and the Pacific Islands. Known for her award-winning brand leadership, Tin's appointment is a strategic move for Visa in the region.
item.content:encoded:
Visa Taps Meble Tin for Oceania Marketing Helm

Meble Tin steps in as Visa's Head of Marketing for Australia, New Zealand, and the Pacific Islands. Known for her award-winning brand leadership, Tin's appointment is a strategic move for Visa in the region.

item.title: Metrics Partners with Deicorp for $1.8bn Sydney Development
item.description:
Metrics Partners with Deicorp for $1.8bn Sydney Development

A transformative project in Five Dock aims to meet a significant portion of local housing needs.

  • Metrics joins Deicorp in a $1.8bn Sydney apartment venture.
  • The development will contribute nearly 25% to Five Dock's housing target.
  • Project aims to transform Five Dock into a bustling village precinct.

Read more
item.content:encoded:
Metrics Partners with Deicorp for $1.8bn Sydney Development

A transformative project in Five Dock aims to meet a significant portion of local housing needs.

  • Metrics joins Deicorp in a $1.8bn Sydney apartment venture.
  • The development will contribute nearly 25% to Five Dock's housing target.
  • Project aims to transform Five Dock into a bustling village precinct.

item.title: Masterplanned Community to Deliver 6,500 New Homes
item.description: A masterplanned community is preparing to bring 6,500 new homes to market, with 200 homes fast-tracked for eager buyers. Stay tuned for more details on this significant residential development opportunity.
item.content:encoded: A masterplanned community is preparing to bring 6,500 new homes to market, with 200 homes fast-tracked for eager buyers. Stay tuned for more details on this significant residential development opportunity.

item.title: Suncorp Faces Rising Premiums Amidst Victorian Car Theft Surge
item.description: Suncorp is feeling the heat as luxury car thefts in Victoria drive up insurance premiums. With natural disasters also in the mix, commercial property stakeholders should brace for potential impacts on insurance-related expenses.
item.content:encoded: Suncorp is feeling the heat as luxury car thefts in Victoria drive up insurance premiums. With natural disasters also in the mix, commercial property stakeholders should brace for potential impacts on insurance-related expenses.

item.title: Miller Wealth's $50m Transfer Raises Eyebrows
item.description:
Miller Wealth's $50m Transfer Raises Eyebrows

Unregistered advisor at Miller Wealth shifts $50m to First Guardian under scrutiny.

  • Miller Wealth moved $50m to First Guardian in a month.
  • The transfer was conducted by an unregistered advisor.
  • ASIC is investigating the transaction's legality.

Read more on The Australian.
item.content:encoded:
Miller Wealth's $50m Transfer Raises Eyebrows

Unregistered advisor at Miller Wealth shifts $50m to First Guardian under scrutiny.

  • Miller Wealth moved $50m to First Guardian in a month.
  • The transfer was conducted by an unregistered advisor.
  • ASIC is investigating the transaction's legality.

Read more on The Australian.

item.title: Abu Dhabi’s IRH Eyes Kestrel Coal Mine
item.description:
Abu Dhabi’s IRH Eyes Kestrel Coal Mine

International Resources Holding from Abu Dhabi has entered the race to acquire Queensland's $4.62bn Kestrel coal mine, competing with Yancoal for exclusive talks. This move could reshape the ownership landscape of one of Australia's significant coal assets.
item.content:encoded:
Abu Dhabi’s IRH Eyes Kestrel Coal Mine

International Resources Holding from Abu Dhabi has entered the race to acquire Queensland's $4.62bn Kestrel coal mine, competing with Yancoal for exclusive talks. This move could reshape the ownership landscape of one of Australia's significant coal assets.

item.title: Argonaut's 2025 Picks: ASX's Top Undeveloped Mines
item.description: Argonaut's 2025 edition of the ASX's best undeveloped projects is here, spotlighting gold, copper, and critical minerals. While the list is known for predicting winners, details on specific projects and commercial property implications are lacking. Stay tuned for more insights!
item.content:encoded: Argonaut's 2025 edition of the ASX's best undeveloped projects is here, spotlighting gold, copper, and critical minerals. While the list is known for predicting winners, details on specific projects and commercial property implications are lacking. Stay tuned for more insights!

item.title: Secret Hobart Rooftop Pad Hits the Market
item.description: Discover a hidden gem in Hobart: a three-bedroom rooftop home atop a 1933 building, now for sale. This property offers a unique redevelopment opportunity in a prime city location.
item.content:encoded: Discover a hidden gem in Hobart: a three-bedroom rooftop home atop a 1933 building, now for sale. This property offers a unique redevelopment opportunity in a prime city location.

item.title: Beachfront Shack Sells for Staggering Sum
item.description: An original beachfront home, held by the same family for three generations, has been sold for a significant amount. The property, initially purchased for £300, highlights the potential for substantial capital appreciation in prime coastal locations.
item.content:encoded: An original beachfront home, held by the same family for three generations, has been sold for a significant amount. The property, initially purchased for £300, highlights the potential for substantial capital appreciation in prime coastal locations.
